experience: You and Diana both know Peter Reno, Mohsen Gamshad, and 66 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

Managing Business Process Management QA team of 54 resourcing with 4 QA leads, 10 onshore & 40 offshore testing resourcing for 11 scrum teams, and end-to-end test coordination of 15 channels and domains partners that integrates with the Pegasystem BPM Case Management applications and Kofax Document Capture application. Managing the Platform Support QA team that provides release regression testing and infrastructure/Concurrency production test support. Implemented QA Evolution to accelerate Agile QA team delivery -- achieving in-sprint regression automation at 80+% level; Instilling defect prevention culture/shift left with quality metrics and on-going process improvement. Completing continuous testing in Dev Ops initiatives.Won on Schwab Challenger Award in 2015. Received multiple Innovation Technology Awards.
Senior QA Lead - SOA QA web services functional, performance, and regression testing

Created and led Web Services SOA QA team of 2 QA leads and 40+ onshore and offshore test engineers  to provide centralized Parasoft SOATest test services for all Schwab Technology departments covering functional, performance, and regression testing that consisted of 35+ project portfolio. Designed SOA QA web services testing framework, standard, and process, and successfully rolled out the test services cross all Schwab Technology departments, in partnership with the architects and development management .
Senior QA Manager - Core Technology Solutions

Managed QA team of 4 QA Leads and 20 onshore and offshore resourcing testing Integrated Cashiering Application, components and mainframe batch systems as delivered by Cash Management Technology, Customer Account Technology, and Offer Orders Technology.  Implemented keyword and data driven Java application UI automation framework and function automation script library with reuse.
Senior Test Manager - Schwab Bank Program/ Broker Dealer Cash Sweep Product

For Schwab Bank program to integrate Fidelity Bank Systems with Broker Dealer back-end systems and the Cash Sweep product, successfully implemented 1500+ mainframe batch jobs run automation and managed End-to-end testing cross 7 domains test departments efficiently via "Baton-Passing" technique from Broker Account management, linked Bank investor checking account management, cash deposits, balance, position, cashiering transactions, regulatory reporting, document management, to customer statement.
Senior Manager, Software Configuration Management & Schwab.com Build Services

Managed a team of 6 ClearCase tool administrators and builds engineers servicing 120+ development engineers for Charles Schwab's schwab.com website, Web Trading, eMail channel, Mobile Applications, and Infrastructure products.  Successfully implemented IBM/Rational ClearCase and MultiSite tool suite with code branch management to address the critical version control issues of the internet applications. Implemented web based test coverage manager/McCabe toolset to report regression test coverage metrics.

recommendations: Peter. Solvkjar
IT Director
August 1, 2017, Peter. managed Diana directly

I have had the pleasure of working with Diana for 5+ years on a large scale BPM Enterprise solution. She was managing and leading the QA team with a constant focus on improvement. She re-tooled the team to focus on automation and was able to significantly increase the test coverage while at the same time reduce test cycle time. She was able to fully integrated the QA efforts into the Agile continuous delivery model.Diana is a great manager and leader. She drives proficiency and efficiency while working with diverse on- and off-shore teams. She is dedicated and trustworthy. Diana is a great asset to any IT team dedicated to high standards.

Technology Executive | Change Agent | Optimizer | Leader
July 23, 2017, Scott managed Diana directly

Diana is an incredible mind in the testing area.  She can combine years of experience in development and strong  testing methodology to create a vision for any organization to be successful.  She has led significant organizations and transformed them from mostly manual testing to almost completely automated, with leaps in quality at the same time.  This drove a cycle time reduction in the regression suite for our largest application and also freed up money to reinvest in other areas.  Diana is an incredibly hard working person who cares about the business outcome to the point where I considered her the "glue" of the organization, making sure all loose ends are tied up before moving to production.  I would highly recommend Diana for a testing leadership position in your organization.

Technology and Quality Assurance Executive  | Highly Strategic | Empowering Leadership
October 3, 2017, Diana reported directly to Rukmini

I was fortunate to have Rukmini as my manager over the course of 5 or so years, to guide the strategy of implementing SOA QA team from scratch. Under her directives, we had introduced the new Web Service enterprise test tool and implemented the centralized SOA QA Testing service for all the Technology groups. Rukmini was influential and had lined up early adoptors pilot groups and had enabled confidence in the offering of the new centralized testing service. The fundamental trust of the Technology leaders on Rukmini had helped reduce the natural resistence to new tool with top management's support, and the rollout plan. We sucessfully rolled out the test service to all Technology groups. Rukmini was influential and had lined up early adoptors pilot groups and had enabled confidence in the offering of the new centralized testing service. The fundamental trust of the Technology leaders on Rukmini had helped reduce the natural resistence to new tool with top management's support, and the rollout plan. We sucessfully rolled out the test service to all Technology groups with 20+ concurrent projects.Rukmini is wonderful to work for. She is insightful and a very postive leader. She focuses on individual strengths and encourages growth in needed areas. Her authencity and transparency style brings out the best from her team. I am lucky to have worked for Rukmini, and has gained a mentor and a friend. I would love to work with Rukmini anytime.

summary: INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY LEADER     Demonstrated success in Software Quality Assurance, Continuous Testing/CI-CD for DevOps, Process Improvements, Shift-Left with Quality Metrics, Configuration & Release Management, and Application Development within financial and Healthcare industries. QA & Test Automation Management – over 10 years of experience. Initiated Enterprise App QA evolution to be more Agile with quality metrics, achieving in-sprint automation at 80% level and reduced release regression cycle by 50%. Managing QA deliveries in Agile teams, End-to-End testing with 16 Channels/Domains partners, and Release & Production support QA team (4 QA Leads, 10 Onshore & 40 Offshore QA). Drives Shift-Left and continuous testing for Dev Ops. Service-Oriented Architecture SOA QA - Implemented SOA QA testing services from scratch, designed SOATest framework and rolled out test services across all Technology groups Drives changes to meet business objectives - From inception to implementation: wrote business case, strategy definition and project plan, designed framework, Standard, & Process, rollout SOATest Test services cross all Technology departments. Implemented ClearCase tool & build services to address company dot com code control issues for 120 developers with project branching standard and merge party processes. Established Broker Dealer mainframe batch testing service to support the Bank Program System End-to-End testing (automated 1500+ batch jobs execution). Initiated a Healthcare Information Security program on Patient Confidentiality Awareness. TECHNICAL SKILLS Atlassian Tool Suite, Confluence, JIRA, Zephyr, Maven, Selenium, BitBucket, Splunk, TFS, MTM, Parasoft SOAtest, Test Director, ClearQuest, Rational ClearCase, MultiSite, Syntax TAS, Intersolv PVCS, SQA Suite, QTP, Softtest, WebSphere, Visual Basic, Sybase, dBase
name: Diana Cheng-Lau
title: Innovation technology leader specializes in Quality Assurance/Testing - proven successes to transform teams to be Agile.
